data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Tacheng, Xinjiang Uygur, China. Please, stir the 110,014 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tacheng, Xinjiang Uygur, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Tacheng, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Tacheng. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, help the 110,014 believers in Tacheng to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Kazakh people. Make the Kazakh people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Tacheng, Xinjiang Uygur, China to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,340,186 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 110,014 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,340,186 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary:
the county of Tacheng, Xinjiang Uygur, China has a population of 1,450,200.

We estimate Tacheng has 110,014 people who might know Jesus, 23,428 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,316,758 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Tacheng.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
